segments.text: Yes . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am calling to let you know that you are expected to come for an interview in our branch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's cool . What documents do I need to carry ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can bring life photos , recommendation letters and certificates .
segments.speaker: S1
